action.selector: DIV[style="position: relative; padding: 7px 50px 7px 0px; margin: 14px auto; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238);"]
DIV[style="background:#2A2A2A; color: #fff; left:0px; bottom:0px; right:0px; position: fixed; z-index: 1000;"]

LI[style="overflow: hidden; background: url(\"data:image/png;base64,\") repeat-x scroll left top lightgreen; border-radius: 5px; border: 1px solid rgb(80, 194, 78); box-shadow: 0px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); color: darkgreen; width: 310px;"]

DIV[style="margin-left: 0px; position: fixed; left: 20px; bottom: 20px; width: 300px; height: 250px; background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); border: 1px solid rgb(153, 153, 153); box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); line-height: 1.3em; z-index: 99999; padding-top: 10px;"]
DIV[class="annotation type-alert type-permanent lspace m-reset-position closableContainer"]
